jobDescription: What We Need A highly experienced Data Warehouse Developer / Analyst who lives and loves data! What You Will DoHelping us improve our data quality, data awareness, and data analyticsMining and processing data for a 30,000 customer SaaS platformParticipating in the end-to-end delivery life-cycle of data projects from business requirements gathering to solution design, development, testing and roll-out.Helping to build advanced data models, analytics widgets, dashboards, and reports for enterprise and customer useWhat We Will Expect You to HaveA brain. Be smart, be opinionated, make good decisions. We're hiring smart people to do great things, not be told what to do.A love of Data and everything about it.A healthy dose of awesome. Be confident in your awesomeness so you can ask for help, admit mistakes, and learn from others. We are a great team because we work together without attitude. No divas. No hermits.Hands-on experience: 2+ years on Qlik Development, HadoopHive development, Python and SQLProject/Agile team experience working closely with development, product, marketing, and support teams .Flexibility to support occasional after-hours and/or weekend activities for key deployments.An Extra Dose of "Awesome" If You HaveExperience with other database technologies (Oracle, Mongo)
